= How to Use? =

* First Download and unzip file 
* put that folder in to the your php directory
* Open index.php in any text editor
* find the line called $file="hoekey.ini";
* Change "hoekey.ini" with your file path i.e. "c:\program files\hoekey\hoekey.ini"
* Now open the page in the browser
* Done!!
